title: Confessions of a Rentboy
description: Previous cover edition for ASIN B07GNSKG4DFor alternate cover edition see hereAcerbic twenty-something Andy is living the dream in London. Too bad he's totally broke. The way to getting paid is getting laid -- or at least that's what he discovers when his friend Michelle introduces him to her somewhat-highly-paid and definitely not glamorous world of call girls and boys. Told with frankness and biting humor, Andy sleeps his way through London: for the sex, the glory, and the rent money.
author: T.R. Verten
